requestBody.description: Parameters to provide to the template being launched.

environment.description: The runtime environment for the job.

additionalExperiments.description: Additional experiment flags for the job.

additionalUserLabels.description: Additional user labels attached to the job.

bypassTempDirValidation.description:
Whether to bypass the safety checks for the job's temporary directory.
Use with caution.

machineType.description:
The machine type to use for the job. Defaults to the value from the
template if not specified.

maxWorkers.description:
The maximum number of Google Compute Engine instances to be made
available to your pipeline during execution, from 1 to 1000.

network.description:
Network to which VMs will be assigned.  If empty or unspecified,
the service will use the network "default".

numWorkers.description: The initial number of Google Compute Engine instnaces for the job.

serviceAccountEmail.description: The email address of the service account to run the job as.

subnetwork.description:
Subnetwork to which VMs will be assigned, if desired.  Expected to be of
the form "regions/REGION/subnetworks/SUBNETWORK".

tempLocation.description:
The Cloud Storage path to use for temporary files.
Must be a valid Cloud Storage URL, beginning with `gs://`.

zone.description:
The Compute Engine [availability
zone](https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/regions-zones/regions-zones)
for launching worker instances to run your pipeline.

jobName.description: Required. The job name to use for the created job.

parameters.description: The runtime parameters to pass to the job.
